snippet: Lawyers on both sides of the Roger Clemens perjury trial have been told to stop asking unnecessary questions and stop showing needless photos.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers on both sides of the Roger Clemens perjury trial have been told to stop asking unnecessary questions and stop showing needless photos.

headline.seo: Roger Clemens Case Is Boring Jurors, Judge Says
headline.main: Slow Pace of Clemens Case Is Boring Jurors, Judge Says
headline.print_headline: Slow Pace of Clemens Case Is Boring Jurors, Judge Says
